taskbody.context: These steps explain how to embed an external page or an image in a model (fragment, module or page).

step.cmd: Drag and drop the widget Include (Ext.) from the palette into the model.
Select the widget in the Editor.
Go to the Properties view pane and select the General tab.

choices.choice: Static URL: edit the content of the property URL and enter a valid URL (Example: http://www.temenos.com).
Dynamic URL: edit the content of the property Domain Attribute . This attribute will contains the URL built at runtime.

step.cmd: Edit the value of the property URL Type and choose Page when the URL designates a web page, or Image when the URL designates an image.
